page.title: 04CAMBORNE SCHOOL OF MINES
page.content: This is a{university}that specialises in{geology & mining.}In the last century Cornwall was one of the Worlds main suppliers of tin & copper. Due to the need for trained engineers in this field,the school was formed in{1859.}In the early days numbers fell & rose with the availability of money but in{1976}it became a registered charity.The school has many foreign students,mainly from South Africa but recently the number of these has fallen.The population at present is{272.}8% are overseas students.The school offers a number of degree courses & has its own mine.They work on various projects amongst these is the{"hotrocks",}which involves tapping{geothermal energy.}This is carried out at{Rosemanowes Quarry}at {Penryn.
